Type.Name: SelectCursorParentHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SelectCursorParentHandler(object o, SelectCursorParentArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed SelectCursorParentHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the SelectCursorParentHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the SelectCursorParentHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the SelectCursorParentHandler is removed from the event.
